alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 1:26AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marshall, northern Benton, southeastern Fayette and southwestern Hardeman Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 126 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, or near Holly Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Mt Pleasant, Lagrange, Michigan City, Red Banks, Slayden, Ashland, Moscow, Grand Junction, La Grange, Victoria, Hudsonville, Higdon, New Canaan, Early Grove, Taska and Atway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
